pr_title: GEODE-7858: PR.clear notify client should let the queue holder member to notify

timeline.message: GEODE-7858: PR.clear notify client should let the queue holder member to notify

timeline.bodyText:
Should this clear be invoked on each server? If it successfully clears on one server, it seems it will be happy. and finish the loop. One could just introduce a break if cleared == true rather than continuing to loop.
The logic here is a bit odd either way.
timeline.author: mhansonp

timeline.message: GEODE-7858: PR.clear notify client should let the queue holder member to notify

timeline.bodyText: I see in the tests the clear operations are invoked from a server directly, rather than from a client. If a server's clientProxies is not empty, can we invoke clear from that server? Will it work? I am not sure why clear has to be invoked from a server with empty clientProxies. Can you explain a bit?
timeline.author: jchen21

replies.bodyText: the story is to verify that clear message is sent on the region level, i.e. even if the clear is done on a member that has no message dispatcher, the message should still be sent to the client. if a server has no clientProxy then it definitely won't have the messageDispatcher.
replies.author: jinmeiliao
